item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – L NAV Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: Use HDG SEL to follow the desired course. LNAV limits bank angle to comply with maneuvering limitations; HDG SEL does not. When operating at MAX altitude using a roll mode other than LNAV, fly at least 10 kts. above minimum maneuver amber speed band and limit bank angle to 10 degrees.
HDG SEL and HDG HOLD must be operative.
GPS, RNAV (GPS), and LOC BC approaches are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard L NAV Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
